a.EnglishSentence: Under the pressure of the board of directors, the manager has to abandon his plan.
a.ChineseSentence: 在董事會的逼迫下，經理只好放棄他的計畫。

a.EnglishSentence: The president showed that he had never doubted my working ability.
a.ChineseSentence: 總裁表示，他從未懷疑過我的工作能力。

a.EnglishSentence: The salesman said he was able to fulfill the task before Friday.
a.ChineseSentence: 那名銷售員說，他能夠在週五之前完成任務。

a.chinese: 在 ... 上 / 在飛機（船、火車）上
a.EnglishSentence: As far as I know, all the staff should be aboard the plane before ten a.m.
a.ChineseSentence: 據我所知，所有的工作人員都要在上午十點之前登機。
